object.name: (a large round table with maps and papers all over it)

equipped.name: (the ansi color book of fiery yay)

mobs.long_desc: Nezer of Raymif floats just above the group here, chewing on some bones!
mobs.desc: This goliath of black scales blocks out any light that might be visible from above.  Its two heads are constantly moving looking for something or someone and spewing large amounts of flame in all directions.  It's hide of armored dragon scales is all black, as dark as the night sky, except for a single glowing red emblem which eminates from his chest, the emblem of the sky god.

mobs.long_desc: @Wan imposing looking @RDEMON@W clad in @Lblack armor@W is @Cfloating@W just above the ground.
mobs.desc: Clad in spiked black chaotic looking armor, Arterius is definitely a scary looking specimen of a demon.

mobs.long_desc: Gleaming like the sun, a golden dragon sits on its haunches, indifferent to your presence.
mobs.desc: The brilliant golden scales of the dragon gleam brightly in the light, protecting its body from all manner of physical attack.  Its gargantuan form rests here ponderously, two large wings protruding sharply from its back, their leathery golden webbing the only part of its body not covered in scales.  Its large glassy eyes survey the surroundings apathetically, bored with the affairs of mortals.

mobs.keywords: beautiful young silver gold silver silvery-gold dragon Lynnli
mobs.long_desc: A beautiful young silvery-gold dragon looks at you wisely.
mobs.desc: She is very noble in appearance, though she is only about the size of a pony - very small for a dragon, so she is probably only about two centuries old.  Her scales are silver, but her horns, talons, neck ridges and wings shine golden. Her deep blue eyes speak of the wisdom of dragonkind that mortals have never known or long since forgotten.  Graceful, sinuous movements add to her inhuman beauty.

mobs.long_desc: A young copper dragon pounces on a shadow here.
mobs.desc: This fierce young dragon gleams a bright copper color.  Her claws and teeth look sharp enough to cause serious pain to her enemies, and the glint in her black eyes is less than peaceful.  Her tail, which alone makes up about half her length, is constantly swishing back and forth as she considers her next victim.  A subtle pattern of facial markers identify her as being somewhere in her first century of life.

mobs.long_desc: Shadowy as twilight, a black dragon flicks its tail around irritably, looking at you scornfully.
The manifestation of angelic purpose stands here, a messenger bag over its shoulder.
mobs.desc: Surrounded by a blinding halo of light, this being exudes a calm, peaceful nature about itself.  Its face is a benevolent expression of serene kindness and its eyes are soft with compassion.  Behind its body, six glorious, immaculate wings rise above its head, declaring its angelic identity.  Across the front of its spotless white robes rests a sparkling golden messenger bag, the symbol of its purpose as a godly messenger.

objects.ground: A sign that says, '&2&bQuesting Hints - Read Me!&0' hangs on the wall.
objects.action_desc: The sign has a message: Be sure to advise the player about the &3QUEST&0 toggle if your quest involves killing creatures and collecting them on the trophy!

objects.ground: &1A small pool of fire burst forth from the ground here.&0
A divine leather belt floats above the ground.

extras.text: This is the belt of deity's and is only ment for mortals to do testing for the gods it SHOULD NEVER BE LEFT WITH A MORTAL ANY LONGER THEN NEEDED!  It will make it easyer for mortals to gather weapon damage testing.

objects.ground: A large black hole lies here folded upon itself.
Some fancy vambraces lie here unclaimed.
A nice green briney dill bekons you to take it.
Some dirty shirt was left here.
&b&9A &0&2junky &b&9TV-Set of old model sits right in front of couch.&0
objects.action_desc: As you peer into the TV Set you see some crapy video in there.

objects.ground: &b&9A torn &2green &9couch sits in the middle of the room.&0
A pice of candy lies here.

objects.short: a piece of sweet hard candy
objects.ground: A piece of sweet hard candy lies here.
A small orange pumpkin lies here.
A paintbrush rests near the wall.
objects.action_desc: This seems to be the artist of the mural's paintbrush.  The bristles have long since dried and hardened, but a faint remnant of color is stil visible.  There appear to be words written on the brush's thick wooden handle.

extras.text: Nothing.

objects.ground: A token that says "proof of anduin checkpoint" lies here.
A shiny thing sticks out from a shiny necklace.
A medium colorful shirt lies here.

extras.text: A brighy colorful shirt with the words &4&bBush/Cheney &1For &7Four &1More&7 Years!&0

objects.ground: A colorful shirt lies here.

extras.text: a colorful shirt with the words &4&bNo More Bush! &1Kerry &7and &1Edwards &7shirt&0 written on it

objects.ground: A very special pin reflects the colors of the rainbow proudly bearing the words 'Celebrate Diversity'

extras.text: This small metal pin is a symbol of pride and strength.  The triangle points down, with the words 'Celebrate Diversity' written across it.  Glazed over the simple backing are six bands of color, starting with red at the top, then orange, yellow, green, blue and ending with a violet band.

objects.short: an obsidian staff lined with veins of red
objects.ground: An obsidiannn staff lined with veins of red lies here.

extras.text: Made of perfectly smooth, shiny obsidian, this six-foot staff is lined with veins of red that glow with inner light and warmth and is searing to the touch.

objects.ground: &9&bA wicked looking dagger with 'Vengeance' carved into the blade, lies here.&0
A steel-bladed longsword lies here screaming about the injustice.
A beam of moonlight hits the ground here.

extras.text: This is Iolar's magical cloak that was a gift from the goddess of the hunt. It's powers are only known to Iolar and the goddess herself.

objects.ground: &4&bThe morning dew drops hang from the leaves. &0

extras.text: These pants are made of grey wolf fur.  The are sized to fit a giant, and they must have come from a huge wolf.

objects.ground: A red card is sitting here.

extras.text: A sweet card of red and pink with a little painted heart on it looks very nice as it sits here, waiting to be opened.  The inside has the text "Happy Valentine's Day from all of us at Fiery!  Love, the Imms" and below it is a short poem.

A special Valentine's game for you To see if your heart is pure and true Two items you'll need to finish the game Two different ones, mind, not two of the same The first is a pink rose of friendship and love The next is a box with sweet treats from above The rose can be found on ones who love true A young Queen whose domain is really quite new A man who loves one of royalty's blood And a mother of pink on all fours with her brood And do not forget the one who loves roses And all other plants be they ravens or posies The poem continues on part2.

For the box you will have to go farther afield For one is on someone who holds a pink shield The next two wear rings of eternal devotion Though one is a Bride's and the other one broken The last box is on a bird full of desire His heart is too hot to touch; it's all fire Once you have both you will know what to do This riddle can only be finished with two From what's in the box you should bring them to me And perhaps a return of the prisoner you'll see

objects.ground: A crimson heart-shaped box rests here, concealing certain treats within.

extras.text: A beautiful crimson velvet, the exterior of the box is finely decorated with silver inlay around the edges.  The box itself has a heart shape, with a cover that looks as if it could be flipped up.  A small hole on the box's top at the point of the heart looks as though it might hold the secret to removing the cover.  A large silver rune rests prominently in the center of cover.
The silver rune is printed on the velvet in an unfamiliar script, but in very small letters below it the word "Love" is written in common.

objects.ground: A pristine, beautiful pink rose sits here.

extras.text: A beautiful pink rose which has barely begun to bloom is here, giving the room a sweet scent.  It has thorns, but they are spaced far enough apart that it would not be uncomfortable to hold.  The bottom is sharpened and could probably be dipped in ink.

objects.ground: A delicious-looking piece of candy is sitting here.

extras.text: A plump, fresh, red strawberry has been dipped into chocolate, looking absolutely tantalizing.  It smells slightly fruity and very sweet, inducing the salivary glands to work their hardest.

objects.ground: A small piece of chocolate is sitting here.

extras.text: A hard chocolate shell over a creamy chocolate center, this piece of candy was surely crafted by the gods.  How else could it be so divine?

objects.ground: An enormous leather bound book lies here.

extras.text: The book is enormous, but it's soft leather binding has protected it well throughout the years.  As old as the realms themselves this book has been passed down to one who would best further it's cause.  Adventurers from all over have contributed to the Atlas of the Ages for generations upon generations, lending their knowledge of the world to fill its pages.

objects.ground: A Holy blade gleams in the light, floating above ground level.

extras.text: This blade gleams with a holy light unbeknown to most mortals.  The power of this weapon is unsurpassed by any artifacts crafted by mortal hands and in fact is fortified by the might of the Holy Deities.  Fear is struck into the wicked and unworthy of the realm; hearts and impure souls tremble at the sight of this weapon of the Holy Gods.

objects.ground: A chainmail bikini is carefully set here.
An eyepatch made of leather has been left on the ground.
objects.action_desc: Made for the right eye, this eyepatch is woven from strands of a lightly colored leather.  The back feels comfortable against a closed eyelid, and the front is inscribed with a strange symbol.

extras.text: An eyepatch made of fine leather, it fits over the right eye.  It is very comfortable and soft, probably soothing to one who has lost an eye violently.  A strange symbol appears on the front.
An eye with three eyebrows and a tear is dyed on with blue and purple dye.

objects.ground: &b&4Ocul's love muffin swarms about, better pick it up!&0
A holy symbol of purple metal lies here, abandoned.

extras.text: This pin is formed of a strange purple metal, shaped into a flat teardrop emblazoned with an equilateral triangle, one point facing downwards, surrounded on each side by spheres.  It glows with a holy power, proclaiming itself as a gift of the Goddess Kourrya to her most favored servants.  It would make an excellent identifying marker on a cloak.

objects.ground: A small silver flame glows here.

extras.text: A shiny silver brooch, shaped in that of a small flame.  It has a sharp pin that lets it fasten nicely to a jacket lapel or collar.

objects.ground: A glimmering flame of silver hovers above the ground here.
A shiny new player stand here, with a dull voided look.

extras.text: A young looking chap with sandy hair and cheap, worthless armours.  A true greenhorn you'd gather, and not very socialable as he just stands there in a rigid posture with a dull, voided expression about his face.

objects.ground: &0A &0&4small fountain&0 spouts out of the &0&9&bwall&0 here.

objects.short: a small roll of old bread
objects.ground: &0Some &0&3stale bread&0 is lying here.
Some moldy cheese lies here.

objects.short: a giant red blood cell pillow
objects.ground: Round and fluffy, a large red pillow rests here invitingly.

extras.text: This large flattened pillow has a velvety crimson fuzz surface, making it very cute and huggable.  There is a large dimple in the center of each side of the round pillow.  On one side, a cute pair of white wooden eyes is sewn into the pillow just above the dimple, giving the pillow an adorable smiling face.  It just beckons you to hug its soft cute plush!

objects.ground: A canteen lies here.
Someone left a magic 8ball on the ground.  It's silently predicting your future.
A dark robe has been left here.

extras.text: The dark robe you now study seems to mirror your curiosity.  Portions of the fabric sway, even when there seems an absence of any wind.  Metallic blue runes ward the cuffs and hood of this magical garment.  The most dominant is a symbol on the very top of its hood: [M]

objects.short: a large round table with maps and papers all over it
objects.ground: A large round table with maps and papers all over it is here.
A huge lightning bolt is coming at you!
A dark hooded robe lies here in a heap.
An Arlian IOU lies on the ground here.
&9&bOne of the Sith Lord's cloaks lies on the ground here.&0
A green and yellow squash lies here on the ground.

objects.short: a scrumptious ear of indian corn
objects.ground: A long scrumptious ear of indian corn is here lying on the ground.
An orange and yellow squash lies on the ground here.
An orange and green squash lies on the ground here.
A translucent &7&bring&0 of &6&bice&0 with runes floats just above the ground.

extras.text: the name &6&bSnobol&0 is carefully etched in the &6&bice&0

objects.ground: A token that says "proof of ickle checkpoint" lies here.
&4&bA leak in from above provides fresh water to drink. &0

extras.text: A small leak from above streams in, flowing to the floor below, ending in a small fountain before draining out.  The water looks fresh and revitalizing.

triggers.name: Long live the king
triggers.commands: say Long live his fame and long live his glory. emote bows their head briefly.

triggers.name: nexus_clock_pin_reload
triggers.commands: oload obj 1203 oecho The &9&bNexus&0 &1Cloak&0 &9&bPin&0 beings to &4&bgl&6&bow&0 mysteriously then fades back to normal. opurge %self%

triggers.name: calian_slayer
triggers.commands: if %actor.quest_variable[quest_items:%self.vnum%]% return 1 oechoaround %actor% A &9&bblack &7haze &0surrounds %actor.name%, obscuring %actor.o% from view. osend %actor% A &9&bblack &7haze &0surrounds you, momentarily obscuring your view. else return 0 osend %actor% You do not feel worthy enough to wield %self.shortdesc%! endif

triggers.name: tanles_testing_trigger
triggers.commands: say My trigger commandlist is not complete!

triggers.name: test_trig
triggers.commands: say %actor.name% is a %actor.class%. if %actor.quest_stage[moonwell_spell_quest]% > 0 say %actor.name% is on the moonwell quest. else say %actor.name% is not on the moonwell quest. endif

triggers.name: Noisy Weapon
triggers.commands: set rndm %random.10% if %damage% == 0 switch %rndm% case 1 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Wow, totally missed that one." break case 2 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Where were you swinging?" break case 3 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Are you even trying?" break case 4 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "No. Not like that.  You're supposed to HIT them!" break case 5 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Why couldn't that other warrior have picked me up." break case 6 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Welp, I guess I will stay cleaner if you never hit." break case 7 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Missed again, big surprise." break case 8 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Oh, so close." break case 9 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Not even close that time." break case 10 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Well, at least you tried." break default oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Wut?" break done else switch %rndm% case 1 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Ohh, the blood!  I'll need a bath after this." break case 2 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Wow, look at that hit!" break case 3 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "You're so strong!  Amazing." break case 4 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Oh yea, that's how you do it!" break case 5 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Booyah!" break case 6 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Ohh, the blood!  I'll need a bath after this." break case 7 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "He won't be coming back from that hit." break case 8 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Yeah.  Much hit.  Very strong.  Wow!" break case 9 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Just like that!" break case 10 oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "Look at your glistening muscles!" break default oecho %self.shortdesc% says, "How did you do that?" break done end

triggers.name: summon_dragon
triggers.commands: if %has_one% != yes if %actor.class% == Paladin oload mob 1260 oechoaround %actor% A brilliant golden dragon flies in, seemingly from nowhere, and nuzzles %actor.name%'s side. osend %actor% You begin calling for a mount.. osend %actor% A brilliant golden dragon answers your summons. oforce golden-dragon follow %actor.name% oforce golden-dragon mload obj 1262 oforce golden-dragon wear dragonsaddle elseif %actor.class% /= Anti oload mob 1263 oechoaround %actor% A dusky black dragon flies in, seemingly from nowhere, and sits by %actor.name%'s side. osend %actor% You begin calling for a mount.. osend %actor% A dusky black dragon answers your summons. oforce black-dragon follow %actor.name% oforce black-dragon mload obj 1262 oforce black-dragon wear dragonsaddle else osend %actor% You begin calling for a mount...but nothing happens. oechoaround %actor% %actor.name% whistles loudly. end set has_one yes global has_one else end

triggers.name: lylaith
triggers.commands: oecho The blade of %self.shortdesc% flares a &7&bbright white&0.

triggers.name: blue_recall_test
triggers.commands: osend %actor% In a flash of blinding light, you find yourself wisked away. oechoaround %actor% In a flash of blinding light, %actor.name% disappears! oteleport %actor.name% 10001 oforce %actor% look

triggers.name: 8ball message generator
triggers.commands: if %arg% == 8ball return 1 oecho %actor.name% shakes a magic 8ball. set rndm %random.20% switch %rndm% case 1 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "As I see it, yes." break case 2 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Ask again later." break case 3 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Better not tell you now." break case 4 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Cannot predict now." break case 5 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Concentrate and ask again." break case 6 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Dont count on it." break case 7 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "It is certain." break case 8 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "It is decidedly so." break case 9 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Most likely." break case 10 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "My reply is no." break case 11 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "My sources say no." break case 12 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Outlook not so good." break case 13 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Outlook good." break case 14 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Reply hazy, try again." break case 15 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Signs point to yes." break case 16 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Very doubtful." break case 17 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Without a doubt." break case 18 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Yes." break case 19 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "Yes  definitely." break case 20 oecho %self.shortdesc% shows, "You may rely on it." break done else return 0 end

triggers.name: red_blood_cell_pillow
triggers.commands: if (%actor.name% == Laoris) && (%victim.level% <= 99) return 1 wait 1 oforce %victim% wear red-blood-cell-pillow endif

triggers.name: laoris test
triggers.commands: wecho AFF: %actor.aff_flags% wecho FLAGS: %actor.flags% wecho DET-MAGIC?: %actor.aff_flagged[DET-MAGIC]%

triggers.name: Acerite_belt_trigger
triggers.commands: if %actor.can_be_seen% && %actor.level% < 100 return 0 osend %actor% The broad silver belt flares white, burning you as you attempt to remove it! oechoaround %actor% A broad silver belt flares and lets off smoke as %actor.name% reaches for its buckle. odamage %actor% 100 fire endif

rooms.name: The Meeting Room Of The Gods
rooms.description: The meeting room is plain and very simple.  A circular table sits in the middle of the room, lit by some unseen light source.  There are many chairs around the table, all empty.  The Immortal Board Room is to the north.

North.description: The Immortal Board Room can be seen to the north.

rooms.name: The Inn Of The Gods
rooms.description: The Inn of the Gods is a small room, holding only a shelf with many small precious stones on it.  When a God comes to rent his belongings, his essence is stored in the stones.  The Immortal Board Room is to the south.

South.description: The Immortal Board Room can be seen to the south.

rooms.name: The Ice Box Of The Gods
rooms.description: The Ice Box is for little boys and girls that cannot play nice. Be good and maybe someone will come and get you.

rooms.name: &0&b&2Buru's&0&2 Room of Medication&0
rooms.description: Here the Gods have magically created an exact copy of the mortal board room.  Any God can easily post and read messages from the mortal board room without being seen by any mortals.  The Immortal Board Room is to the west.

West.description: The Immortal Board Room can be seen to the west.

rooms.name: Gods Entry Room
rooms.description: Nothing.

North.description: The Gods' Inn can be seen just to the north.

East.description: The Mortal Board Room can be seen just to the east.

South.description: The Gods' Meeting Room is located to the south.

West.description: The Gods' Post Office is just to the west.

rooms.name: The Post Office Of The Gods
rooms.description: The Post Office Of The Gods is the same as most Post Offices except that it is not as slow.  Even the Postal service knows not to anger the Gods. Piles of junk mail line the walls.  I guess even Gods get on mailing lists. The Immortal Board Room is to the east.

East.description: The Immortal Board Room is just to the east.

rooms.name: The Shadow Plane
rooms.description: This room seems to go on forever in every direction.  There is no floor, no roof, and no walls.  You are floating in a never-ending realm of darkness and shadow.  From every direction you can hear the screaming of tortured souls crying out for mercy.  Shadow-like images of creatures and people slowly fade in and out of your view as if they are never completely in this realm.  There is no obvious source of light, yet you can see quite clearly.

rooms.name: The War Room
rooms.description: Huge maps of the known world line the walls of this gigantic room.  Tables are lined in an organized fashion on the floor, and have detailed maps of every area spread out on them.  A host of creatures buzz around the room moving figurines that correspond to real life characters on the world below and matching their movements on the maps.

rooms.name: Beyond the bounds of reality
rooms.description: You float through a seemingly empty void.  The only light here is from smoky clouds of amber fire in the distance.  You are in the domain of Chaos home of the Furies.  They are around you, watching you, considering you.

rooms.name: XiATH'S RooM
rooms.description: You are in an unfinished room.

rooms.name: The Waterfall Grotto
rooms.description: A chill mist hangs in the air, shrouding detail from sight.  Far above your head, perhaps a hundred feet or higher up, long, treacherously-sharp stalactites reach for you.  Here and there, water condensing out of the mist drips from their jagged tips.  The walls and floor glisten with an inner light, crystalline patches of green, blue, and pink flickering in the mist. Long, irregular floes give the wall a rough appearance, though the floor is mirror-smooth. The most peculiar feature of the cavern is the waterfall - Waterfall! - collecting in a pool that fills most of the cave's floor.  The vast volume of plummeting water is deafening and silent all at once; you can still hear the echoing drip of water falling from the stalactites.  Staring into the wall of churning water, you feel a warmth come over you, a deep inner peace that transcends the cold and ice all around you. What manner of being makes her home here?  Surely the frigid lake would freeze solid anyone who trespassed into its waters, but the liquid shimmers with something magical, the essence of life itself.  Whatever her nature, the keeper of this grotto is not of the world of men.  Staring into the hypnotic, roaring waterfall, you yearn to catch the merest glimpse of her.

extras.text: You touch your finger to the slick surface of the cavern's wall.  Quickly you jerk away, rubbing and soothing the flesh of your hand.  The walls must be ice - that would explain the numbing cold that bit your outstretched finger. Beneath the mirror-smooth ice, colors shimmer and glow, lighting the cavern with a dim and almost sourceless light.

Through the magic of the Worldsong, Selina can open gateways to the many worlds of the mutliverse.  Though none are currently open, the portals to these worlds shimmer and glow in phase with Selina's beautiful notes, windows that lead to any number of worlds.

The cavern's floor is bowl-shaped and filled with a vast sea, a glistening pool of magical waters.  The liquid is steel-blue and aquamarine all at once, and it glows serenely from within.  The waterfall continuously pours into the pool, though ripples pass not across its mirrored surface, and it has no evident outpouring.  Surely the liquid is freezing cold!

The waterfall pours down from far above, its source shrouded by the cold mist that fills the cavern.  It plummets hundreds of feet, crashing into and filling the pool that dominates the grotto's floor.  Gazing into its churning maw, you feel a deep peace and calm come over you, and you find it difficult to turn away.

Most of the cavern's floor is filled with a vast pool, though where you stand the ground is solid, albeit peculiar.  It must be ice, like the walls, but it is a white so deep it is black, a smooth onyx that reflects your stare and your soul.  A narrow path leads all the way around the pool and behind the waterfall itself, though you do not trust the slick surface enough to venture far from where you stand.

Gazing into the silver-blue pool, you see a shimmering white sphere. Within the sphere you can see blurry shapes, though you are completely unable to discern what they may be.  With a start of realization, you suddenly know that you stare into one of the famed portals spun by Selina's Worldsong.

rooms.name: Messy Dorm Room
rooms.description: You have entered a room if that is what you can call it.  You are sure that your feet are touching what you can only guess is the floor.  There are cloths carelessly thrown in a pile in the left corner of the room.  Some faint music is coming from the computer that was left on.  In all of this chaotic messy you see a bed with muddled sheets, that might look nice to lay on, but you have your doubts.  It brings you back or forward (depending weather or not you have been to college yet) to a time when you are worried about passing English 101. Now that you have entered you have no clue how to get out.  You turn around and the door is gone.

rooms.name: Demolitum's Realm
rooms.description: You find yourself in a dark void of sorts. Nothing can be seen or felt here beyond a tangible sense of evil.

rooms.name: The Wolf Den
rooms.description: You find yourself in a large cave that smells slightly of some type of animal.  A shimmering radiance sheds dim illumination about the place.  Wild shadows flicker to and fro, constantly catching your attention at the edge of your vision.  Bones are scattered here and there, some from mighty beasts of prey.  Surely what ever dwells here is a fearsome hunter.

North.description: A small tunnel in the northern wall creeps away into darkness.

East.description: There is a small crack you might be able to squeeze through in this wall.

South.description: There appears to be a small tunnel hidden behind some rocks here.  You may be able to clear the way and see where it leads.

West.description: There is a large, worn path leading west from here.

rooms.name: Nevd's Arctic Cabin
rooms.description: As you enter this sparsely-furnished cabin you are immediately surrounded by warmth and coziness; a stark contrast to the blustery winter conditions outside.  In the hearth, a fire sparkles so brightly that it almost hurts your eyes to gaze directly upon it.  A few chairs and small tables have been carefully arranged to entertain guests, otherwise, this small lodging seems to serve no functional purpose for its lone inhabitant.

Down.description: Downwards, you see the Altar to Mielikki.

extras.text: Smilies are Nevd's favorite things!

rooms.name: Myst's Mistress
rooms.description: You are standing amidships on the deck of the pirate ship Myst's Mistress. She is a large 2 masted vessel almost 100' in length and nearly 30' abeam.  To either side you see the the endless fog that is the Blue Fog Sea.  I wouldn't try going for a swim if I were you.  Behind and above you on the aft deck stands the helmsman dressed in fine silks.  He steers the vessel with a sure steady hand.  Standing near the helmsman is the navigator dressed in a similar fashion.  How anyone can navigate these waters is beyond your comprehension and you wonder what the captain who commands these skilled men must be like. Glancing around you can't seem to find him but you can feel his presence here even if you can't see him.  Looking up into the rigging you see men tending the massive white sails all dressed in a similar fashion to the two men behind you. They go about their business in a calm manner that suggests they are totally at easy hanging from ropes 70' off the deck.  In fact everyone around has that same seasoned professional look.  A shudder as you realize what a daunting sight it would be to see this ship bearing down upon you with hostile intentions.  The ship begins to pitch and roll beneath your feet as an approaching storm starts raising large waves to play with this ship.

East.description: Looking over the starboard side you see nothing but the endless expanse of the blue fog sea.

West.description: Looking over the port side you see nothing but the endless expanse of the blue fog sea.

extras.text: The helmsman of the Myst's Mistress stands here clutching the wheel with sure, steady hand. His eyes continuously scan the waters the lie ahead double checking the lookouts posted in the rigging above.  He is wearing black pants and blouse with a sash of deep purple silk encircling his waist. Miraculously these clothes are immaculate and do not show even a hint at spending many days in the sun and spray.  Attached to the sash is a large cutlass in a finely tooled leather scabbard.  By the look of him you decide that you have no desire to find out how skilled he is with his weapon and quickly search for something safer to direct you gaze towards.

rooms.name: Inside Zzur's Bag
rooms.description: You are shrunk down to a miniature of your former size and find yourself trapped inside a plain leather bag!  Wiggle all you want, you aren't getting out of this one...

rooms.name: Xirgha's Dump
rooms.description: Thick walls of solid highly polished marble, stretch far into the blackness of the perpetual night in this strange land.  There is no ceiling and the seasons race taking only minutes to cycle.  From the clear warm embrace of a summers night, to the fiery red fury of a winters storm.  Lightning streaks and thunder crashes as spring quickly hurries by, bringing torrents of rain that strangely never touch the ground.  The walls are are strange indeed.  At first glance they resemble liquid mercury, but that would be impossible as they easily retain a solid form.  The walls are slightly curved giving the room a slight crescent shape.  Far ahead blue and green lights shimmer, reflect off a large pool that continuously flirts between liquid water and ice.  In the center of this large shallow pool a single small flames hovers.  It is not clear where such a place might exist, but it was definitely created by a being with immense power.

rooms.name: Tanle's Hall
rooms.description: No one is quite sure where this place came from.  The writing on the walls suggests that a child once, or perhaps still does, frequent this place.  Could it be that the keeper of this hall is himself immature? Only time can tell us this. Only, does a child belong in a place like this, surrounded by both scalding flames on the east wall, bone-chilling ice crystals to the west, and some callous blades and daggers thrust into the ceiling above?  An impressionable youth could get the wrong ideas about what to do and when to do it in a place like this.

rooms.name: A secret hollow in an ancient oak
rooms.description: Part of the bark of this giant oak has been fashioned into a door, leading into a large hollow that was long ago converted into a well-loved home.  The giant hollow is partitioned into two roughly sections: a kitchen and a sewing room.&_ In the little kitchen area is a large stone fireplace, a great cooking fire blazing brightly within it.  Near the hearth is an ancient stone counter-top, a window above it open to the outside world, filling the space with soft light. On the counter is a holder with several cooking utensils.  Cooling on the windowsill is a fresh loaf of bread.  Everything in the kitchen has a strict order, which tends to be incomprehensible to anyone else.&_ The sewing room is usually neat as well, but not nearly as organized as the kitchen.  At the moment however, fabric of all kinds are strewn across the room, forming a virtual sea of colors and textures.  There is a large shelf that seems to fill the entire room, filled with boxes, each labeled with their contents.  Boxes are also stacked from the floor to the shelf in every part of the room, forming a second wall against the bark.&_ You see one special box, set slightly aside from the rest, glowing softly. A small sewing table stands in the center of the sewing area.  This little hollow is truly a place where a goddess crafts entire worlds with a single stitch of a needle and thread.&_ You should know better than to go snooping around a place like this!

extras.text: Hanging over the fire is a nicely sized iron pot, a delicious smell wafting from it.

There is a large assortment of items here, everything from spoons to strainers, from wood to all varieties of metals.  One item in particular stands out: a large mortar and pestal.  Fine dust still lines the little ceramic bowl and the counter, showing this counter is frequently used.  Looking closer, you see that the dust is simply what remains of a massive cooking project that Daedela undertook yesterday.
The bread is made of the freshest hand-prepared ingredients and baked with pure love.  Sadly, this is all that remains of the faerie's latest epic bakeathon.

It's hard to imagine someone who would have seven boxes labeled 'Plain Thread' and actually have each one packed full!  Skimming the box labels, you see hundreds upon thousands of labels for materials of all kinds.  'Natural Red Velvets', 'Blue Indian Silks', 'Grecian Clay Beads', and a strange-smelling box labeled 'Blossom Pleens' are just a few of the rare materials that you see.
This box is made of mahogany, hinged with obsidian clasps and wrapped in sheets of precious silver spider webs.  Written on it in dark indigo ink is the word 'Souls'.

Disheveled fabrics cover half-used patterns, spools of thread and yarn tangle together in knots of gorgeous chaos.  Needles, sewing shears, thimbles, small cutting knives and all manner of other tools of creation are kept in little pockets and drawers throughout the table.  Of the projects on the table, half-built worlds, fleeting dreams, long-built desires, extinct and even yet-to-come creatures are but a few things that seem to be under current construction.

rooms.name: The Chamber of Eternity
rooms.description: The shadows dance around the walls as if they are swaying to the deep, pulsing drum beat that is barely perceptible, echoing and reverberating throughout the air.  The dull, black walls surround the chamber, forming a circular area.  There are vast columns that rise from the crimson marble floors to the massive dome ceiling that towers above.  Carved into the columns are alcoves that hold large orbs of electricity, which flicker and occasionally emit showers of sparks.  The electricity gives the chamber a somber glow and lights up the entire area.  There is a large reflecting pool, built of dark stone, that rests in the middle of the chamber.  A row of benches, which are formed of a grey mist and held together with unknown forces, encircle the pool and give abundant seating for everyone.

extras.text: As you stare into the pristine waters, you start to see the entire realm of Ethilien.  As you gaze deeper into the pool at an area of the realm, your sight focuses in and you can see a closer view of that region.  If you concentrated you can even magnify your sight deep enough to see the grains of dirt on the ground.  With this observation point, you can see everything that is happening within the realm.

rooms.name: Think
rooms.description: Nothing.

rooms.name: Base of a Great Oak
rooms.description: You are standing at the base of a huge Oak tree.  The trunk is at least thirty feet in diameter, and the canopy up above you branches out forever in all directions.  The bark of the Giant Oak tingles with a magical energy of sorts, and you catch glimpses of tiny sprites moving all around the tree and branches above.

rooms.name: Iolar's Tree House
rooms.description: The entire canopy of this huge tree has a sense of being lived in.  The branches form tables and chairs, while the breaks in the leaves become windows to the world outside.  All around you faeries flitter from limb to limb keeping the tree healthy.

rooms.name: The Cliffside Grotto
rooms.description: A moderately large grotto, half-carved, half-natural.  The gray stone curves overhead, faintly reflecting the sounds of splashing water that emanate from a steaming pool.  A balcony with sofas and bookshelves sits about five feet above the level of the pool.  The entire northern face of the grotto opens to the air, and behind a stout iron railing, there is nothing but sky and clouds.

extras.text: The grotto appears to be embedded in the face of an extremely high cliff.  It stretches for at least a mile or two to the east, while on the west, it curves gently northward for a few hundred yards.  The ground below is obscured by mists fed from a thin waterfall that slowly drifts from the point of the western promontory.  Dark green trees carpet the land.  A lake sits between mountain ranges far to the northwest.

The water falls from the tip of a promontory about five hundred yards to the west.  It is somewhat lower than the grotto, so the stream that feeds it can be seen sparkling as it rounds a corner on its way to free-fall.  Shortly after beginning its plunge, the water breaks up and spreads.  Long before it reaches the ground below, it has become a diffuse plume of drifting mist.
The forest below the cliff is dark green, suggesting conifers.  Nothing more can be discerned from this great height.

The railing is wrought iron.  The primary rail has a two-inch cross-section and passes from the right side of the opening, where it is affixed with thick bolts, to the balcony on the left, where it rises with the curve of the floor to protect the balcony's end as well.  Iron posts support it at six-foot intervals.

The balcony occupies the western side of the grotto.  It rises about five feet above the pool and is perhaps ten feet away from it, and is wide enough to accommodate a sofa, lengthwise.  There are in fact three sofas, two of which face each other obliquely while facing somewhat toward the pool.  The third faces the grotto's opening at an angle.  Bookshelves line the grotto wall on the balcony.
It looks comfy.

The pool is steaming mildly.  It looks to be comfortably warm.  It's possible to sit all around its edges with at least one's head above the water.  Nearer its center it goes down to about five feet.  It is fifteen feet across and shaped like a rough ellipse.  An aqua color is somewhat visible.  A constant current slowly flows in through an opening on the south end, and out another on the north.

rooms.name: You are Stunned!!
rooms.description: You are teleported through the planes!!

rooms.name: The High Altar of the Shadow Temple
rooms.description: Shadows dance around the walls and along the black stone altar in the center of the room, pausing here and there to flicker or shimmer.  Candlelight comes from a single taper set at the center of the altar, lighting the room softly. Writing in an unfamiliar script covers the walls, but cannot be read in the dim lighting.  Far off, the sound of water dripping and the scurrying of tiny feet is complemented by the soft moaning of the dead.

rooms.name: A Dark Hovel in the Outer Planes
rooms.description: Nestled somewhere between the prime material plane and the astral realm, this small, cramped space is cloaked in shadows cast from the plane of negativity.  The floor is crafted from seven individual slabs of marble, each having a different sigil painted on it's surface.  The sigils seems to writhe and shimmer if looked at for a long time, as if some magical force was working within them.  Each arcane symbol is encircled by a jet black ring of ebony, as if bounding the power of the sigils within.  There are no obvious walls in the place, just shadow giving way to darkness, then nothingness.  A sturdy throne of ebony stands in what would be considered the northernmost part of the room. The throne is tall, much taller than an average man.  The seatback is fashioned from various dark, rich woods from all over the material plane.  The arms and the seat itself are crafted from the darkest ebony.  The large chair seems to absorb any light that sneaks into the room.

rooms.name: Pergus' Observatory
rooms.description: You have entered a looming hall that stretches about five hundred feet, with vaulted ceiling and elaborate pillars running then length.  The smooth marble used in its construct absorbs nearly all light, casting a soft, almost ethereal, reflection of all things nearby.  Grand architectural carvings border the top of each wall with runic inscriptions found etched center wall at metered intervals, centered on brightly burning sconces. Carved in the midnight black pillars are scenes of varying detail, each one telling a story as it progresses towards the far end of this massive hall. Peaceful scenes at first, turning to that of grand battles and righteous or demonic creatures, as they come to an end near a three-tiered dais with a velvet cushioned throne atop. Adding to the awesome design of the hall is a six foot wide river of molten lava that courses like molasses through the heart of the marble floor, swirling its way towards the far end before it splits to flow around the stone dais and flame shaped throne.  Amassed in the left corner from the throne, a horde of shinny golden coins, precious emerald, rubies, magical trinkets, swords, and armors spill from several wooden chests onto the marble. In the opposite corner is a huge bookshelf with tomes, manuals and scrolls abounding, most tattered and fragile to the touch.  In front of the bookshelf is a large mahogany desk, cluttered by astral maps, charts and various scrolls, marred by candle scorching and a thick stream of wax that runs down from the corner.

rooms.name: Rushing through the air!!
rooms.description: You have been torn from the ground and are rushing quickly violently skyward!! The wind rushing by you blurring all your senses!!

rooms.name: Flying through the clouds
rooms.description: You are so high in the sky the clouds obscure most of your view. You can barely make out a forest town rushing by to the south and some fast swamps with a blackened scar on the east side. ... uh oh.. you seem to be slowing down....

rooms.name: Falling
rooms.description: You are now screaming earthward at unbelievable speed. Wonder if there are any dragons flying nearby to snack upon you as you fall through the sky.... naaaah, but the ground is coming up so fast you are probably not going to make it..

rooms.name: Crater
rooms.description: *SPLAT* You impact with the ground so hard you eject fresh earth into the sky forming a huge smoking crater!!

rooms.name: Within a Beating Heart
rooms.description: The surrounding walls are a pulsing red, fleshy substance, glowing vein-like striations crossing across its surfaces.  A diffuse glow seeps through the vascular walls, filling the vicinity with an eerie pink light.  Periodically, vents on opposite sides of the room burst open and an acrid red liquid bursts into the room through valves in the walls, flowing out through vents in the floor.  The membranes of the walls seem to pulse in tune with the valves, their rhythmic motion creating a deep, invasive vibration thumping throughout the room.

North.description: This valve is much darker the the surrounding walls, as if engorged with blood...the blood of the innocent.  Mwahaha.

East.description: One of the larger valves heads east.  As it bursts open and close, a rushing sound can be heard through the opening, almost like...wind.

West.description: As this valve snaps open and shut, an ominous aura of doom seeps through.

Up.description: Shadows obscure this valve, even when light is shown directly upon it.  The half-moon shaped flaps look necrotic, yet somehow continue to pulse with unholy energy.

Down.description: This valve is slightly bluish, perhaps stained by the deep blue liquid flowing through it.

rooms.name: Lobus pulmonis
rooms.description: This chamber is windy!  The pink sponge-like walls have the appearance of coral, but their rhythmic swelling and contracting causes air to rush in and out of the vicinity.  Thin, gangly tubules spider across the surfaces, slowly throbbing as some viscous liquid pumps through them, their hue periodically iterating between flushes of deep reds and blues.  The epithelial walls twist off in all directions like a neverending series of cave passages.

West.description: One of the larger tubules branches off down a scraggly passage in the coral-like walls.  A deep warmth emanates from this direction, and a barely audible thumping sound can be heard over the wind.

rooms.name: The Bloody Nightmare
rooms.description: A sad attempt at was once great

rooms.name: Room of a Bad Person
rooms.description: Who has been purged!

rooms.name: Acerite's tod0 room
rooms.description: You stand in a small cubical, it looks like it has been cloned from a Dilbert cartoon. On the far wall is a whiteboard with lots of crossings out and messages on it. There is a cluttered desk opposite the board and a chair in the middle of the floor. There is also a computer on the desk running a 'Matrix' screensaver.

rooms.name: A Laboratory of Fire
rooms.description: This chamber's walls appear to be made of hot black coals, and a few sections of the walls go as far as to spurt small blue flames on occasion.  A single small window opens out to the outside world, though what sky is visible is generally covered by a dark grey cloud of either storm or ash.  Beakers, distillers, and various other implements of red-hot volcanic glass bubble and boil mercilessly upon tables of some specimen of red-veined alabaster, while a palm-sized creature apparently made entirely of flame hops frantically around the tables on its six legs maintaining and adjusting the experiments.  The low rumble and sharp crackle of a high-burning flame emanate from somewhere below the scorching-hot floor.

extras.text: Roughly the shape of a spider, but with only six legs, the creature of flame hops from table to table tending the experiments.

The tables are made of a gleaming white stone, shot through with veins of that shade of red that consumes the coals of a low-burning fire.  The veins glow slightly with an internal light and heat, pulsing with their hue as the veins of a living creature might pulse with its blood.

Outside the single narrow window dark clouds of ash hang low, obscuring most of the world.  The room is located within a tower built completely of the essence of flame.  What little can be seen of the ground below through the clouds of ash is nothing but broken rock and volcanic glass.

rooms.name: A Reading Room
rooms.description: A quiet little alcove set off from the rest of the world seems to exist all by itself.  No doors are evident, but closed glass windows look out on an unrecognizable mountain vista.  Bookshelves line all available wall space.  In the room's center, someone has carefully arranged a plush black leather chair, a wooden stand, and a reading lamp.  Various books repose in various stages of openness on the stand.  Also on the stand is a wax candle in a brass holder, sputtering and providing a small amount of warmth and light.  Other than these things, the room is almost completely unornamented.
